Reviews.Title: NB4L KIT
Reviews.Author: PX
Reviews.Content: This kit (NB4L KIT) is a great deal. The battery and small tripod work very well. With the price that I paid, I did not expect such high quality stuff. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: love/hate
Reviews.Author: raelyn0511
Reviews.Content: I got this package for the mini tripod and battery. I also used the screen protector on my camera and it has bubbles, but what can you do really, they don't give you something to control it. I thought the tripod would be much bigger, it's actually as tall as an iPod touch if you want to compare. I feel like it would've been bigger. I make videos for YouTube, and the tripod doesn't work for me, so now I have to purchase another. However, the battery is perfect of course.

ProductInfo.Features:
NB-4L Rechargeable Lithium Ion Replacement Battery
Mini Table Top Tripod
Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
Lens/LCD Maintenance Cleaning Kit
(See Description for Compatible Models)
ProductInfo.Name: NB4L Lithium Ion Replacement Battery for Canon Powershot ELPH 300 HS / ELPH 100 HS Digital Cameras DavisMAX Bundle
